description:
The Tungsten II Jacket is a GORE-TEX® hardshell, updated with a more aggressive hood, new venting features, and sustainable recycled insulation. With a GORE-TEX® 2L shell and recycled VerticalX Eco insulation, this jacket will keep you dry and comfortable in all conditions. This fully seam-taped, waterproof, and windproof hardshell has a wire brim and Hood Lock to keep you dry and comfortable in all conditions.

The Tungsten II Jacket features pit zip venting, a brushed tricot chin guard, and a helmet-compatible hood. The Tungsten II Jacket is perfect for those who want the warmth of an insulated jacket combined with the breathability of a hard shell.
name: Outdoor Research Tungsten II Jacket - Mens
